metadata.Title: CVE-2022-30287 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Horde Groupware Webmail Edition through 5.2.22 allows a reflectioninjection attack through which an attacker can instantiate a driver class.This then leads to arbitrary deserialization of PHP objects.

criterions.comment: php-horde-turba: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
